issue.title: [C++][Compute] Document ExecNode, ExecPlan
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13227](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13227). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-11930 added a markdown file with some basic descriptions of ExecNode and ExecPlan. It'd be better if we made that into a full formal Sphinx document alongside compute.rst
